price: Akkaan kafaraa haqa didaa hunda jahannamitti darbaa.
arabic: أَلۡقِيَا فِي جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٖ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: alqiyā fī jahannama kulla kaffārin ʿanīdin
